TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Abnormal cells are found on the inside lining of the urethra. These abnormal cells may become cancer and spread into nearby normal tissue.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage 0 urethral carcinoma in situ"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "carcinoma de la uretra in situ, estadio 0"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: carcinoma de la uretra in situ, estadio 0

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Se encuentran células anormales en el revestimiento interno de la uretra. Estas células anormales se pueden volver cancerosas y diseminarse hasta el tejido normal cercano.
